Text: My Life in France is an autobiography by Julia Child, published in 2006.
Triplets:<Julia Child
1:
--------------------
Text: My Life in France:  It was compiled by Julia Child and Alex Prud'homme, her husband's grandnephew, during the last eight months of her life, and completed and published by Prud'homme following her death in August 2004.
Triplets:<Julia Child
